name: VaroPuskia 3D
description: VaroPuskia 3D is a 3D remake of the very first game i made named VaroPuskia. It was a very simple game written in python using pygame and you had only one thing to do: Varo puskia. This is Finnish and means: Watch out for the bushes. This is also my first game i made using Godot Engine. Use Space to jump and Escape for pause menu on desktop, on mobile you have the appropriate ui elements for that. Have fun!
